page.title: 04 FAMILY LIFE IN SOUTH-AYR
page.content: Most families consist of Mum and Dad and 2 children. Many houses are detached with gardens and a garage. About half of the families run 2 cars. Most go on holiday at least once a year. Half go abroad. Of those who stay in Britain renting a house is most popular and favourite places are the Highlands and Cornwall. Weekends are spent shopping, gardening, going car runs, picnics, sailing and visiting. Many Dads play golf and watching T.V. is popular. A varied diet is enjoyed. This includes meat, fish, fruit and vegetables and some convenience foods. Fathers mostly work locally-but many travel abroad in the course of their job. Most are professional men. Only a sixth of Mums work full time. Most households have pets.
